intro: Every battle at sea brings you closer to freedom… or doom.
description:
Your crew plundered a forgotten Mayan temple-and paid the ultimate price. Cursed by ancient gods, you and your ship are bound to the Pirate Grotto, doomed to rise again after every fall. Rival captains, empowered by stolen idols, now rule the seas. To break the curse, you must hunt them down, reclaim the relics, and face the truth that binds your entire crew. Sail across dangerous sea charts, from storm-lashed coasts to haunted wreck zones. Engage rival ships in ferocious naval battles, then clash steel and pistol on deck in brutal duels. Each defeat drags you back to the grotto, but every return pushes you closer to lifting the curse that chains your souls.

Key Features:
	•	Epic Story Campaign: Follow the tale of your cursed crew, bound to the Pirate Grotto and haunted by Mayan relics.
	•	Naval & On-Foot Combat – Battle rival ships in real-time sea clashes, then take the fight to the decks with swords, daggers, and pistols.
	•	Progression & Customization: Enhance your ship, expand your arsenal, and equip rare gear to refine your playstyle.
	•	Unique Sea Charts: Every map brings distinct challenges and environments, from whirlpools to skull-shaped cliffs.
	•	Souls-like Challenge: Death is not the end. Each defeat returns you to the grotto, forging resilience and driving you closer to your final victory.
	•	Varied Enemy Encounters: Face everything from nimble raiders to heavily armed warships, each demanding different tactics.

In Pirate Simulator – Corsair Skull & Sails, every voyage tests your strength. Every defeat sharpens your resolve. Only by facing the sea’s deadliest captains can you break the curse and set your crew free.
